cast.name: 叶卡捷琳娜·马利科娃 Ekaterina Malikova

introduction: In the Georgian port city of Batumi, Captain Yunus from Turkey met a Russian girl Nadia and fell in love with her. Their first night on the ship was passionate and not without "consequences" ... After a while Nadezhda learns that she is pregnant. But the ardent lover, fearing the condemnation of his family (and he was married), cowardly abandoned Nadezhda alone, with his problems ... A girl named Katya is born, who is left without a mother due to the circumstances. Raised in an orphanage, the matured Katya learns from one of her mother's friends about the existence of her father, who lives in Turkey. And the girl, in search of her father, goes to the Turkish city of Trabzon. The poor girl will have to endure many disappointments, betrayal and troubles while she tries to find her father ... And will it bring her joy?
